blogPost.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 51 days in a row, down 67% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/D5Hn8DAVHK
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续51天下降，比1月6日的高峰期下降了67%。🙏https://t.co/D5Hn8DAVHK。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續51天下降，比1月6日的高峯期下降了67%。🙏https://t.co/D5Hn8DAVHK。

previous.title: With 93% of companies reported, Q4 S&P 500 GAAP earnings were down 21% over the prior year. $SPX https://t.co/rBZCz8dOjI
